# NSTextSelection.Affinity.downstream

**Case**

The value that defines the visual location of the text cursor between the head of line that contains the selection location.

## Declaration

```swift
case downstream
```

## Affinities

- **NSTextSelection.Affinity.upstream**: The value that defines the visual location of the text cursor to the tail of the previous line.

items.description: The value that defines the visual location of the text cursor to the tail of the previous line.
items.name: NSTextSelection.Affinity.upstream

title: NSTextSelection.Affinity.downstream
